result.title: Question about ITMO Summer Camp in Programming
result.content:
Recently I found a webiste by chance. http://en.ifmo.ru/en/page/186/Summer_Camp_in_Programming.htm

I am quite interested in the program, cuz it would be a wonderful experience (I really want to travel to Russia and improve programming btw:)

But I have a few information about it (even I have no idea about 'Does the project still work?'). So is there someone who attended or heard of this project? Can you say something about the classes and organizations? Thanks a lot!
